case.name: CQC Advice
case.description: Please don't respond with `asked_fighter=1`, only `asked_fighter`. Asking the target 'fighter' tag for advice for close-up fighting. Responses can be genuine advice, sarcasm, or even just admitting that they aren't good at CQC.

case.name: What makes a good mercenary?
case.description: Leonie is asking what others think would make a great mercenary. Expected positive response e.g. "Someone who will fight for others", expected negative responses "One who finds the best paying job"

case.name: Leonie's Title
case.description: A follow up to her previous question about being a mercenary. She will suggest a random title for herself. You can respond with approval, disapproval, or a new suggestion. She stores the one she says out loud.

case.name: Boots & Socks
case.description: Leonie takes off both her boots and her socks at the same time. She later regrets skipping ahead.

case.name: Notice Teacher
case.description: Leonie is asking the stripping target (a teacher) about themselves.

case.name: Notice Armor
case.description: Leonie is asking the stripping target (wearing armor) about themselves.

case.name: Op Lost Notice Uniform
case.description: Leonie notices that the target has a non-military school uniform, and comments on it. If this triggers for a character with a military tag & school uniform, please let me know.

case.name: One Man Only
case.description: Leonie makes note of the fact that there's only one man at the table, ~only_male~. Doesn't fire if any players are crossdressing.

case.name: CQC Advice (Multiple)
case.description: A variation of her question where she asks a fighter for combat tips that fires whenever there are multiple opponents with the same tag. The asked_fighter marker is set to be her intended target's ID in this version.

case.name: Crafting Prompt
case.description: Leonie asks other people if they are any good with their hands - in the sense that they would be good at crafting something, either realistically or in an abstract game way.

case.name: Rivalry Activation (Mid-game)
case.description: Leonie starts becoming very competitive under certain circumstances, such as when she's stripped down with two or more men present.
